title: I expect LoL to be dead by 2022.
body:
LoL will be a dead game by 2022 at this rate.


And thats being generous

replies.body: Four to five years from now you'll have moved on either way

I dont think you are wrong. Its not that League of legends is a bad game. Its honestly a great game. But know what else is a great game? CSGO. Its playerbase has started to die. Sure its plagued by issues like cheaters, but this doesnt change the fact that at some point all good things must come to an end.

Now you say dead. But Dead can mean a lot of different things. League of legends boasts over 1 million people playing at any given time. This is a HUGE number. DOTA 2 for example barely gets 450,000 during peak times. So if league were to go down to 300,000 at peak times.. that would be dead in comparison to what it is today.

So I dont think league will be completely dead by 2022. But I dont think it will still be played at the rate that It is today. By that point im expecting DOTA 2 numbers. Definately by 2030 though Riot will have either moved on to bigger and better things, or go under.
I think a game being popular for 14 or so years is a pretty big accomplishment. All good things must die eventually.
LoL is dead already. What are you talking about?
In 2021 Cthulhu wakes and we'll all be either dead or begging for the privilege to be eaten first.

It wont be.

It takes a serious of horrible decisions to kill a highly successful game, ones riot is not going to make.

Incidentally people said that 5 years ago, and they say it in nearly every game. And it is rarely accurate.
